sentence.Network_en: The jockey pulled the horse up at the top of the homestretch.
sentence.Network_cn: 赛马师把马停在赛道的最上方.

sentence.Network_en: They were on the homestretch when the computer crashed.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们的工作即将完成时,电脑死机了.

sentence.Network_en: El Guerrouj took the lead after 900 m and stayedahead until the homestretch.
sentence.Network_cn: 埃尔?盖鲁伊在900米后就取得领先位置直到最后冲刺阶段.

means.word_mean: 2. the straight stretch of a racetrack leading to the finish line

list.explanation: (源出赛马用语)在最后(冲剌)阶段

example.en: We're in the homestretch with this project and can't change it now.
example.zh: 我们是在实施这一计划的最后阶段，现在可不能更改。

example.en: We're in the stretch. Only three more days till we graduate.
example.zh: 我们现是最后冲刺阶段。再有三天的时间我们就毕业了。

auth_sentence.content: I was coming down the homestretch, the man looked at me as if I were insane, and said bitterly, You've got to be kidding.
